availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hiram Barker, Jr. (Brown County, IL, farmer )

body.p: Brown County, Illinois, farmer. Ohio native. Son of Crawford Barker and Eliza Barker. Married to Hannah Barker. Father of John C. Barker and Eliza A. Barker. Student in Macon, Illinois, in 1850. Farmer in Cooperstown in 1860. Farmer in Cooperstown in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Illinois, Macon County, Macon, p. 147B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Brown County, Cooperstown, p. 748.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Illinois, Brown County, Cooperstown, p. 26A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Brown County, IL, July 1863, p. 58.
